reviewText: Well done movie!!! My kids love it
Great movie with solid, Catholic theology - fun for the whole family!
My kids imitate the lines in this movie (ages 3 to 7). Definitely a good starter movie for kids who maybe don't have a clue about babies. Innocent won't be lost with this one.
It shipped quick! The movie is great!  The movie is perfect for a family having a new baby.  It prepared my kids for a new sibling with excitement and ex
